title: Resolve establishing a commission to study the Commonwealth’s response to and resources for victims of domestic violence and sexual assault

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. O'Connor, a petition (accompanied by resolve, Senate, No. 1751) of Patrick M. O'Connor that provisions be made for an investigation and study by a special commission to study the Commonwealth’s response to and resources for victims of domestic violence and sexual assault.  Public Safety and Homeland Security.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

related_entities.name: committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 05/07/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2
Resolve reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means

related_entities.name: committee on Senate Ways and Means
the committee on Senate Ways and Means
